Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

post

format

If not CFF, post table format should be 2.

Post table format is 3.0 but should be 2 (except for CJK fonts). Please investigate.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/post

'U+042B' (ID 406): width is 1847, base glyph ('U+042C' (ID 407)) width is 1180

Compare Advance Width hmtx and CFF table

Compare Advance Width hmtx and CFF table

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

hmtx/CFF

Advance width

Advance width of hmtx and CFF table should be the same (tolerance 2 units).

This is a TrueType font. This test is only for CFF.

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

post

CANNOT check double NULL names. Format 3.0 post table.

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

cmap

uni200B

Check ZERO WIDTH SPACE

Missing uni200B in cmap table.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 98

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
463 = 463

post

CANNOT check first four glyphs names. Format 3.0 post table.

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

-/-

Index 0:

0 (bestname)

Glyph has contour: True

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

-/-

Index 1:

1 (bestname)

Glyph has contour: False

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

-/-

Index 2:

2 (bestname)

Glyph has contour: False

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

-/-

Index 3:

U+0020 (bestname)

Glyph has contour: False

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

-/-

Index 98:

U+00A0 (bestname)

Glyph has contour: False

OS/2 table

OS/2 table

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

OS/2

usBreakChar

'OS/2' usBreakChar should be 0x0020.

OK: 'OS/2' usBreakChar is 0x0020.

Pass

italic flag

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Editable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

embedding level: Embedding Level = Editable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'GillSansNova-CondLt'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLt', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLt', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

OK: NID 1 length is '22'
'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt'

name/head

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '19'
'GillSansNova-CondLt'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLt', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLt', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Lt' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt'.

Pass

Mac and MS NID 13

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

License Text is present.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt'

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Ultra, Demi, Semi, Extra, Xtra, X, Sm'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '25'
'GillSansNova-CondLtItalic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLtItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondLtItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Lt Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

MS is: '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Gill Sans Nova'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 17

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Cond Lt Italic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Italic (GillSansCondLightItNova.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 0 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 0, Copyright' (Mac/Roman/English)

Copyright is present.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '19'
'Gill Sans Nova Cond'

name

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Ultra, Demi, Semi, Extra, Xtra, X, Sm'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Gill Sans Nova Cond'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '17'
'GillSansNova-Cond'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-Cond', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6: OK. No camel case required.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Regular (GillSansCondNova.ttf)

name

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 4

MS NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Italic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '23'
'GillSansNova-CondItalic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Italic (GillSansCondItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Ultra, Demi, Semi, Extra, Xtra, X, Sm'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Gill Sans Nova Cond'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 2

Mac NID 2, Subfamily.

OK: NID 2 is 'Bold'

OK: NID 4 length is '24'
'Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 4

Mac NID 4 = NID 1 and NID 2.

NID 4 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond' + 'space' + NID 2 'Bold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '21'
'GillSansNova-CondBold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Should be camel case PostScript Name NID6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'CondBold'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

OK: NID 1 length is '19'
'Gill Sans Nova Cond'

NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Bold' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 14

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'
MS is: 'http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold (GillSansCondBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac and MS NID 16

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are different.
Mac [1, 0, 0] is: 'No entry.'
MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Gill Sans Nova'

Error

MS [3, 1, 1033] is: 'Cond Bold'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '27'
'GillSansNova-CondBoldItalic'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondBoldItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Bold Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Bold Italic'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

NID 17 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Ultra, Demi, Semi, Extra, Xtra, X, Sm'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Bold Italic (GillSansCondBoItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Check Width Names Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

The width name should be before weight name. NID 17 is correct: 'Cond Bold Italic'

Pass

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. Any other use is prohibited.'

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

'GillSansNova-CondXBd'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBd', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBd', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Reserved word used in Subfamily Name NID2 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 2 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name/head

MS NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '20'
'GillSansNova-CondXBd'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBd', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBd', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: MS NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Regular (GillSansCondExtraNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond XBd' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd'.

Pass

Mac and MS NID 13

Mac and MS name table entries should be the same (English).

Entries are the same.
Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBdItalic', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondXBdItalic', Everything looks good.

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
MS NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond XBd Italic' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd' + 'Space' + NID 2 'Italic'.

Pass

Mac is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'
MS is: 'Microsoft supplied font. You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Gill Sans Nova Cond XBd Italic (GillSansCondExtraItNova.ttf)

name

Macintosh NID 11 (Mac/Roman/English)

Necessary name table entry according Monotype: 'Macintosh NID 11, Vendor URL' (Mac/Roman/English)

Vendor URL NID 11 (Mac/Roman/English) is missing.
Please verify agains spec. It might be ok if it's a symbol font.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

'Copyright' has invalid entry.

Name table entry ends with 'space':
'© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved.[ ]'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 0 (1, 0, 0, 0)

Mac NID 0, Copyright.

Please verify agains spec.
Mac NID 0 is '© 2014 The Monotype Corporation. All Rights Reserved. '
It should follow this structure: 'Copyright (c) XXXX - XXXX /entity/. All rights reserved.'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Mac NID 1, Family Name length shouldn't be longer then 31.

OK: NID 1 length is '30'
'Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word 'Bold' used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications. Style linking and/or font embedding for MS Word might not work.

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

'Bold' at the end of NID 1 causes cross platfrom issues.

It looks like you want to have a 'stand-alone'-font without any style linking, because NID 2 is 'Regular' and NID 1 has the word 'Bold' at the end 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold'.
This cause issues in PowerPoint, when you create a PowerPoint presentation on your Mac and you want to open it on a Windows machine. The font might be displayed twice in the font selection menu of MS PowerPoint for Windows + cross platform compatiblity does not work. You may want to consider to replace 'Bold' by 'Bd'. It should work then. (Customer A&E May 2019)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Roman'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1

Entry: 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Reserved word used in Family Name NID1 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 1 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Should be camel case Family Name NID1

NID 1: OK. No camel case required.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check style extentions Family Name NID1

NID 1 does not contain any of the following beginnings: 'Dm, Ex, Ultra, Demi, Semi, Extra, Xtra, X, Sm'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 1

Check Width Names Family Name NID1

The width name should be before weight name. NID 1 is correct: 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

OK: NID 2 is 'Regular'

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name/head

Mac NID 5

name table version should match head table fontRevision.

OK: name table version entry 'Version 1.02;O365' does match fontRevision 'Version 1.02'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '26'
'GillSansNova-CondUltraBold'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondUltraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Mac NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'GillSansNova-CondUltraBold', Everything looks good.

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6

Entry: 'GillSansNova-CondUltraBold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 6

Reserved word used in PostScript Name NID6 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 6 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

name

Mac NID 6

NID 6 contains correct campel case: 'CondUltraBold'

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7

Test Trademark

Current trademark is:
'Gill Sans is a trademark of The Monotype Corporation.'
but what do think about this
'Gill Sans is a trademark of Fontsmith Ltd and may be registered in certain jurisdictions.'

(This is automatically generated and might be wrong. Must be confirmed by legal)

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 8

Manufactur (NID 8) should be Monotype IP

OK: Mac NID 8 is 'Monotype Imaging Inc.'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
Mac NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

Mac NID 14

Mac NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

name

MS NID 7/13

License text, if Trademark (NID 7) is 'The Monotype Corporation'

License text contains 'Monotype Imaging Inc'.
Normally you should just keep it as it was in the original data (often that entry is non-existing). Just double check. It shouldn't be related to Monotype Imaging Inc! In case of concerns just give the Legal team a call and please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
NOTIFICATION OF LICENSE AGREEMENT You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype Imaging Inc., its affiliates or its licensees. You acknowledge that the font software is protected by the copyright and other intellectual property law of the United States and its various States, by the copyright and design laws of other nations, and by international treaties. Your use of this font software is limited to the rights license rights granted to you in the Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement (EULA) agreed to by you at the time of purchase and you should retain a copy of such EULA for your future reference. You may not use, rent, lease, sublicense, give, lend, or distribute the font software, or any copy thereof, except as expressly provided by the EULA. The current Monotype Imaging End User License Agreement can be viewed at http://www.fonts.com/info/legal/eula/monotype-imaging.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

NID 16 'Gill Sans Nova' + 'Space' + NID 17 'Cond Ultra Bold' = NID 1 'Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold'.

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Roman'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Regular, Bold, Italic, Extra, Light, Black, Thin, Wide, Ultra'

Pass

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Gill Sans Nova'

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

name

MS NID 17

Reserved word used in Typographic Subfamily Name NID17

Entry: 'Cond Ultra Bold'
The keyword 'Ultra' is not part of current standards:
More infos here:
Unified Monotype Weight Name Rules

Pass

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

You may use this font to create, display, and print content as permitted by the license terms or terms of use, of the Microsoft product, service, or content in which this font was included. You may only (i) embed this font in content as permitted by the embedding restrictions included in this font; and (ii) temporarily download this font to a printer or other output device to help print content. Any other use is prohibited.'

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Kerning (kern Table and GPOS Kerning)

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

GPOS

-/-

Simple check if kern feature in GPOS table.

Font does not have GPOS table/kerning. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

Warning

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

kern

-/-

Check if 'kern' table in TTF font.

Font has 'kern' table. Please verify if font requires kern table or if only GPOS kerning should be in font.
For example: PowerPoint only supports a flat GPOS kerning or a kern table. So, if the customer requires PowerPoint support, a kern table is necessary.

Error

achVendID

OK: Vendor ID is 'MONO'.

Error

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

OS/2 and head

sTypeAsc/Desc and unitsPerEm

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1864) should match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (2048), but it is smaller. Consciously?

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Ultra Bold Regular (GillSansCondUltraBoNova.ttf)

hhea.descent: -612

PostScript names

Info

Gill Sans Nova Cond Lt Regular (GillSansCondLightNova.ttf)

post

PostScript names

Postscript names should not be longer then 29 characters. May cause issues in PDF.

Font has no PostScript names.

Info
